name: Beef and Chili Macaroni Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Beef and Chili Macaroni Recipe: Boiled penne pasta Â½ packet Under cut beef sliced 350 grams Capsicum slices 2 large Onions slices 1 large Green chili slices 1 large Ketchup 1 cup Soy sauce 4 tbsp Salt 1 tsp Oil 5 tbsp Garlic chopped 3 tbsp Ginger slices 2 tbsp
instructions: In a pan heat oil and fry garlic .now beef fry on high flame for 2 minutes . Then salt .soy sauce and ketchup add and fry for 1 minute . After this all vegetables mix and garlic and fry for half an hour . Finally pasta add and mix then serve .
